page.title: 04Cogan School
page.content: { { by Sophie Prisk. Cogan School is a nice school. It is a primary school. It has 210 pupils. There are 8 class teachers and Mrs Saunders is the Head Teacher. We have 1 supply teacher and a helper called Mrs.Jeans. Our school secretary is called Mrs.Lowe. Mrs.Brookman helps children with their maths and reading. When the pupils leave the school they go on to St.Cyres Comprehensive School. In our school we wear a uniform. The girls wear a blue or grey skirt, white blouse, striped blue tie and a blue jumper. The boys wear navy or grey trousers, white shirt, tie and jumper. Last year our school was 100 years old. It was our centenary. The girls wore white pinafores and the boys wore stiff white collars. .
